rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0001
rows.name: Looks like you're awake.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0002
rows.name: How's the new left arm feeling?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_JNK0010
rows.name: Good

rows.label: xs05140100_SEL0011
rows.name: Check left arm and nod.

rows.label: xs05140100_JNK0020
rows.name: Bad

rows.label: xs05140100_SEL0021
rows.name: Look at left arm and tilt head doubtfully.

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0003
rows.name: That's gooood~[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0004
rows.name: All thanks to Lin acting quickly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0005
rows.name:
All the biocirculatory fluid would have leaked out,
and regeneration wouldn't have been possible if not her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0007
rows.name:
Hmm, the analysis results
didn't show any particular problems, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0008
rows.name:
Can't confirm any fluid leakage from the joint, and
since the fingertips are moving fine...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0009
rows.name: Doesn't seem like there are any problems, but[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0010
rows.name:
Lin's treatment was perfect.
And if the analysis results show no problems either[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0011
rows.name:
Isn't it just that the sync between the body and the arm
is still low?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0012
rows.name: Probably.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0013
rows.name:
Not much time has passed since your operation.
Sadly, there's nothing I can do to speed up the sync process.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0014
rows.name: I think it'll be fine after a while.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0015
rows.name:
First, I have to apologize
to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0016
rows.name: I should've realized you might've forgotten about this, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0017
rows.name:
As you've probably noticed, the body you're inhabiting
is artificial. We call them "Blue Bloods."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0018
rows.name: Sorry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0019
rows.name:
B.Bs. are designed to mimic
human physiology as much as possible[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0020
rows.name:
so that in daily life
we don't consciously think about that,[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0021
rows.name: That's why I can enjoy cooking, too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0022
rows.name:
The crew piloting and maintaining
the giant emigration ship[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0023
rows.name: All of them are B.Bs.

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0024
rows.name:
But why did you need to become B.Bs.
, meh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0025
rows.name: It obvious![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0026
rows.name:
We didn't know if it would take decades or centuries
to find a habitable planet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0027
rows.name:
Who would want to crew the ship if they knew
they were going to grow old or die along the way?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0028
rows.name: I see. So that's how it is, meh.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0029
rows.name:
Our real bodies
are sleeping in the Life Point, just like everyone else.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0030
rows.name: We control our B.Bs. remotely from there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0031
rows.name: So don't forget.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0032
rows.name:
Finding and securing the Life Point
also means securing our own lives.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0033
rows.name:
If the Life Point where our real bodies are in cryosleep
ceases to function...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0034
rows.name:
...Everyone, including every B.B. in NLA,
would drop dead on the spot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0035
rows.name: And there's one more thing I should warn you about.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0036
rows.name:
Even if we lose our current bodies, we can get a new
B.B. and become functioning again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0037
rows.name:
But that reconfiguration can only be done
at the Life's core[ST:wide ]― the Central Life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0038
rows.name:
Mehmeh! Then if you're taken out by Growth or native creatures
and lose your B.B.[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0039
rows.name: You can't come back right away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0040
rows.name:
For now, I want you to treat it as if it's your only life
and act cautiously.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0041
rows.name:
Don't treat it roughly, just because it's a B.B.
That's a request from your team leader.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0042
rows.name: There's one more I need to tell you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0043
rows.name:
To prevent confusion, it's a fact kept hidden
from everyone except BLADE team leaders.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0045
rows.name: Have you seen the clock on BLADE Tower?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0046
rows.name:
That clock
is displaying a countdown.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0047
rows.name: What kind of countdown, meh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0048
rows.name: The Life Point's operational limit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0049
rows.name: [ST:undisp ][ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0050
rows.name:
The Life Point, separated from the White Whale's main power core,
will reach its operational limit soon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0051
rows.name:
We absolutely must find it before then
and secure a new power source.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0052
rows.name: And if we can't find it...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0053
rows.name: These bodies will no longer sustain us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0054
rows.name: In other words[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0055
rows.name: A world of eternal darkness... death comes[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0056
rows.name: To every Earthling, equally, without exception.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0057
rows.name: Elma-san, what now?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0058
rows.name: Your condition[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0058_2
rows.name: seems alright.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0059
rows.name:
Let's go to BLADE Tower.
We need to report the mission to Commander Vandham.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG0060
rows.name: Right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs05140100_MSG9000
rows.name: [ST:wide ]―B.B. Maintenance Center [ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]
